Class WordUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • WordUtilities

  • public class WordUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Finds all the words that can be formed with a list of letters, then finds the word with the highest Scrabble score.

    • Constructor Summary

      • main

      • getInput

        public static java.lang.String getInput()
        Enter a list of 3 to 12 letters. It also checks all letters to insure they fall between 'a' and 'z'.
        Returns:
        A string of the letters

      • findAllWords

        public static java.lang.String[] findAllWords(java.lang.String letters)
        Find all words that can be formed by a list of letters.
        Parameters:
        letters - String list of letters
        Returns:
        An array of strings with all words found.

      • matchletters

        public static boolean matchletters(java.lang.String word,
                                   java.lang.String letters)
        Determines if a word can be formed by a list of letters.
        Parameters:
        word - The word to be tested.
        letters - A string of the list of letter
        Returns:
        True if word can be formed, false otherwise

      • printWords

        public static void printWords(java.lang.String[] word)
        Print the words found to the screen.
        Parameters:
        word - The string array containing the words.

      • bestWord

        public static java.lang.String bestWord(java.lang.String[] word,
                                        int[] scoretable)
        Finds the highest scoring word according to Scrabble rules.
        Parameters:
        word - An array of words to check.
        scoretable - An array of 26 integer scores in letter order.
        Returns:
        The word with the highest score.

      • getScore

        public static int getScore(java.lang.String word,
                           int[] scoretable)
        Calculates the score of a word according to Scrabble rules.
        Parameters:
        word - The word to score
        scoretable - The array of 26 scores for alphabet.
        Returns:
        The integer score of the word.
